Subject: Financial Planning
Description: As much as we might want to avoid it, we're slowing becoming adults with adult responsibilites.  We can all use advice on money management and planning for our future.  Speakers include:Ericka S. Kahler - Track: Life  - Duration: 50 minutes

Subject: Tools for Outlines: M.I.C.E., The Three Act Structure
Description: Is your story about Milieu, an Idea, a Character, or an Event? Figure out what sort of story you want to tell, and see which elements are most important, how you might want to structure the story, and how to tell if you've reached the end.   Speakers include:Paul Kemner, Ericka S. Kahler, Eric S. Raymond, Michael K. Elliot - Track: Literature  - Duration: 50 minutes

Subject: Mechanics of Magic in Fantasy & SF
Description: Does a magical system for a story need rules? Costs, unintended consequences, social factors? What about reliability issues? How can we avoid worn-out tropes. How should magic in an RPG and story differ? Is some of the tech in SF 'magic' and should the same considerations apply?  Speakers include:Paul Kemner, Ericka S. Kahler, Eric S. Raymond, Andrew Zimmerman Jones - Track: Literature  - Duration: 50 minutes
